conbody.p: This topic is conrefed by paragraphs by Directory, File Tail. All but the bullets are also used by Kafka Consumer. The ph-def is used in Attribute-Generating StagesThe File Tail origin creates record header attributes that include information about the origins of the record. You can use record:attribute functions to use the attribute information in pipeline processing. For more information about record header attributes, see .

The File Tail origin creates the following record header attributes:
filename - Provides the name of the file where the record originated.
file - Provides the file path and file name where the record originated.
offset - Provides the file offset in bytes. The file offset is the location in the file where the record originated.
